channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Das Keyboard 5QS Mark II Review: A Keyboard Lost in Time
item.description: Even with innovative RGB applets, Das’ latest mechanical keyboard feels stuck in the past.

item.title: ChatGPT now lets you schedule reminders and recurring tasks
item.description: Paying users of OpenAI’s ChatGPT can now ask the AI assistant to schedule reminders or recurring requests. The new beta feature, called tasks, will st...

item.title: A 24-year-old who exited his first company to Coinbase raises $3M for his next venture
item.description: At 24 years old, Pryce Yebesi already has one exit: selling his crypto invoicing company Utopia Labs to Coinbase for an undisclosed amount. Some found...

item.title: Meta to cut roughly 5% of its workforce based on performance
item.description: Meta is reducing its workforce by about 5% through performance-based terminations, Bloomberg reported on Tuesday. The company plans to hire new people...

item.title: The 6 Best Massagers for Sore Muscles and Stress Relief (2025)
item.description: Don’t cancel therapy just yet, but these portable and at-home massagers might be the hack you need after stressful days.

item.title: Why some former Bench customers are not happy

item.title: Far-Right Extremists Are LARPing as Emergency Workers in Los Angeles
item.description: White supremacists and MAGA livestreamers are using the wildfires to solicit donations, juice social media engagement, and recruit new followers.

item.title: Apple joins consortium to help develop next-gen AI data center tech
item.description: Apple has joined a consortium creating next-gen technology to link together chips in AI data centers. The consortium, the Ultra Accelerator Link Conso...

item.title: You Have NASA to Thank for Wireless Headphones and Vacuum Cleaners
item.description: The space agency’s Spinoff project displays the countless everyday technologies that were spurred by space-related research.

item.title: OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R Review: Fast and Smooth
item.description: The OnePlus 13 sets the stage for a feisty battle for the smartphone crown in 2025.
